840040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Moderns Vol 01 (Token Pack)
840040.description:
Moderns Vol. 1

Modernize your your game with Monster Grin's 110 unique tokens of modern day individuals, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists!
Beautifully depicted characters artfully depict everything from homeboys to hipsters, gamer guys to gun-totin dudes, guys and girls alike - theyre all here waiting to add some 21st Century flavor to your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and bring your game up to date!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, full body, and silver):
  • Earring Guy
  • Gamer Guy
  • Glasses Guy
  • Hat Dude
  • Headphone Girl
  • Hipster Girl
  • Hipster Guy
  • Homeboy
  • Rifle guy
  • Tattoo Girl
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
